title: LOS in a private layout shall be for the exclusive use of the residents of such private layout only and shall not be subjected to acquisition by MCGM/Appropriate Authority
clause_text: LOS in a private layout shall be for the exclusive use of the residents of such private layout only and shall not be subjected to acquisition by MCGM/Appropriate Authority. Further in such cases area of existing Recreational Open Space shall have to be maintained by residents of such private layout.
